title: Our first time meeting
description: Our story began in the Socialize VC. I remember feeling an instant connection that I couldn't explain.

title: Our first private call
description: Just us, talking for hours. Time seemed to stand still as we got to know each other better.

title: Our first "I love you"
description: The words felt so natural, as if they'd been waiting to be said all along. I'll never forget the way my heart raced.

title: First time missing you
description: Distance has never felt so tangible. Even when we're apart, you're always in my thoughts and in my heart.

title: Our first argument
description: Every relationship has its challenges. Working through this together only made us stronger.

title: Our song
description: Whenever I hear it, I'm transported back to all our special moments together.
